snippet.title: Long Since The Eschaton Visual Novel Trailer
snippet.description:
Long Since the Eschaton is a charity project for Mental Health Awareness Month, that will be released after the month. Since it is a female character pursuing a male LI it will also be included in Otome Jam 2023 to raise awareness.

It's a COMPLETELY FREE game and For every 100 downloads will give IDR 100k to https://bullyid.org/

Voice actor credits:
 @KatQuinton as Kira
 @AlaoCreative as Gabriel

Co-writer and editor credits : @TrueMonkeyNinja 

check for game updates and more here : https://azurextwilight.itch.io/
